Job Description :
Job summary
Would you like to make the world more sustainable through technology Would you like to help our customers innovate and deliver breakthrough solutions for their end customers and businesses that align to sustainability agendas and goals Would you like to pioneer the use of cloud services to help drive innovation to achieve sustainability goals Would you like to be part of building a fast-growing program to worldwide scale

As the APJ Digital Sustainability Lead, you will have an exciting opportunity to lead customer engagements and work with our area Digital Innovation specialists, APJ & WW leadership & local AWS teams. You will work closely with selected customers - engaging line of business and C-suite leaders, understanding their opportunities & challenges, leading sustainability engagements utilizing Amazon mechanisms & best practices and helping customers understand the changing landscape and the need for innovation through to prototypes and scaled solutions leveraging technology. Your responsibilities include partnering with customers to work backwards from their customer needs, expectations and goals and to identify and prioritize solutions and/or develop new innovative solutions while positioning AWS sustainability values. Your work will influence APJ go-to-market approaches, thought leadership and innovation offerings.

You must be comfortable working in a fast-paced and entrepreneurial enterprise technology sales environment, and working with cross-functional teams as many parts of the program will have interdependencies with other teams within AWS. Typically cross-functional collaboration includes sales teams, sales leadership, solutions architects, marketing, partners, professional services, and sales enablement.

The right candidate will have experience delivering Sustainability agendas & initiatives for/at enterprise customers. This includes demonstrated experience in understanding sustainable goals and building business and customer initiatives to support these. The right candidate has a proven track record of leading and driving multiple simultaneous projects to meet customer business objectives, excellent project management skills, a customer-obsessed and collaborative approach, strong data and metrics bias, a good understanding of cloud solutions, and a passion for helping customers transform using cloud technologies.

*This position can be located in either Singapore or Australia (Sydney or Melbourne).

Key job responsibilities
. Working backwards to understand customers challenges and opportunities, and partner to identify and prioritize solutions (or develop net new solutions), while positioning AWS value proposition(s) for sustainability initiatives.
. Deliver engagements that assist customers to define sustainable innovative product ideas to address customers expectations and competitive gaps
. Develop corresponding commercial proposals, bringing together the relevant teams including functional, legal, compliance, and business.
. Work closely with AWS technical teams, partners and customer teams to develop and deploy prototypes and scaled solutions, in line with customer's sustainability goals
. Represent and build AWS best-practices around sustainability, innovation, product management, software engineering, data and analytics, and other platform capabilities to work
. Collaborate with the Global Sustainability Team to develop the AWS Sustainability POV
. Develop C-suite and line-of-business relationships within customer organization within the Sustainability industry
. Build a Sustainability practice and offering that is scalable across customers in APJ
. Develop and define key metrics to monitor sustainability performance across the program/product lifecycle. Professionally communicate and present to key decision makers and senior leaders of the business via QBRs, Flash updates, key metric reports
Basic Qualifications :
. Bachelor's Degree with 10+ years of experience in consulting, solutions development, product management, and/or transformation roles with a sustainability capacity
. Industry experience in Sustainability Example: energy/water management, renewable energy, supply-chain (GHG emission tracking and analysis, packaging, transportation)
Experience with green energy and solar projects, smart sensor / green technologies
. An understanding of green transportation, electric vehicle infrastructure and logistics
. Knowledge in high volume industrial operations
. Excellent stakeholder engagement and change management experience
Preferred Qualifications :
. MBA or equivalent post-graduate qualifications
. A strong understanding of the 17 United Nations sustainable development goals and IPCC studies, and how they apply to customers in different industries
. Experience working with Enterprise organizations to develop sustainability goals, agendas and programs
. Excellent business and financial acumen and negotiations skills, with ability to influence senior stakeholders
. Technical acumen and understanding of emerging disruptive technologies, like cloud computing, IoT, Data Analytics, Machine Learning, Computer Vision, AR/VR etc
. Passion for the targeted industry sectors - good understanding of how sustainability initiatives operate and the unique characteristics of the industry ecosystems
. Exceptional interpersonal and communication (both written and verbal) skills. Experience communicating with both technical and non-technical stakeholders across multiple teams
. Passion for cloud technologies - deep understanding of public and hybrid cloud platforms
. Technical knowledge of applications, platforms, and data ecosystem, with ability to go deep on technical aspects to understand current and future customer needs and present AWS technical benefits

What if I'm not an expert in all the above That's okay. We hire people who have a passion for learning, and are curious to build, learn and grow. You will be supported in your career development here at AWS. You will have plenty of opportunities to build your technical, leadership, business and consulting skills. This will include formal and on the job training, and a chance to learn and upskill through AWS certification courses and mentorship. You will learn from and collaborate with some of the brightest technical minds in the industry today. If you want to work with the best cloud technologies from the world's leading cloud provider, apply now. We can't wait to see what you build here. Come build the future with AWS.

CULTURE AND COMMITMENT TO INCLUSION, DIVERSITY & EQUITY

At AWS, we welcome all builders. We believe that technology should be built in a way that's inclusive, accessible, and equitable. We're committed to putting in the work for more equal representation.

Amazon is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. Amazon is an equal opportunity employer, and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, age, or other legally protected status.

Amazon is an equal opportunity employer, and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, age, or other legally protected status.

tech_stack: Scalability  Cryptography  Ruby  Enterprise Architecture  Python  Ruby On Rails  Java  Encryption  Software Development  Business Agility  Wholesale Banking  Emerging Technology  Gis
job_description:
Company Background Partior Pte Ltd
Acknowledging that the future of global payments is on the cusp of a fundamental shift, DBS, J.P. Morgan, and Temasek have developed an open industry platform to reimagine and accelerate value movements for payments, trade and foreign exchange settlement in a new digital era through a newly established technology company, Partior.
Designed as a global shared ledger, Partior aims to disrupt the traditional cross-border payment by leveraging blockchain technology to reduce current frictions and latency, minimising post transaction exception handling and reconciliation activities.
Key distinguishing features are privacy, complete decentralised hosting, and consensus efficiency providing commercial scalability that enables it to be a platform of choice for hosting multiple CBDCs and commercial bank digital currencies.
To encourage broad participation across the banking industry, Partior will be actively engaging leading banks to join the platform to establish the scale required to benefit the industry. The platform will start with a focus on facilitating flows primarily between Singapore-based banks in both USD and SGD, with the intent to expand service offerings to other markets and in various currencies.
There is an opening for a talented software technologist that wants to be at the forefront of technology innovation.
Key Professional Requirements
? Strong engineering fundamentals and an automate everything mindset
? Advanced understanding of Cloud Platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)
? Experience designing, building, and deploying cloud-based solution architectures
? Advanced understanding of container technology, Kubernetes, Docker, Nomad
? Advanced understanding of Terraform and infrastructure as code
? Proficient in one of the following languages: Python, Java, Ruby, Shell Scripting, Go
? Proficient in CI/CD and Devops software development processes
? Familiarity with Information Security frameworks/standards (i.e. CIS, NIST, RFC2196, etc).
? Familiarity in the security areas of Key Management Systems, Certificate Management, Encryption, Security Monitoring.
? Has a Bachelor's/Master's degree in computer science, engineering, cloud or security accreditation or equivalent industry experience.
Preferred Requirements:
? Familiarity with P2P network constructs in relation to Blockchain
? Familiarity with wholesale banking, clearing and settlements experience will be a plus
? Familiarity of cryptography in relation to blockchain
Key Responsibilities
Implement a state-of-the-art platform to enable the business to deliver a cross-border payment platform using blockchain technology
Be recognised as a trusted partner to our customers and other technology teams who seek to make use of the platform.
Introduce emerging technology and best practices to ensure consistency and state of the art systems are engineered.
Special responsibility for:
o Ensuring that the platform conforms to Partior's security best practices and is fully consistent with the companies design ethos.
o Helping build the culture of like-minded technologists & professionals looking to disrupt the market.
Preferable Individual qualities
? Solution-driven: Practical and resourceful.
? Hands-on; willing and able to assist with ad-hoc requests from other teams.
? Has learning agility to keep abreast of the latest technology
? Team player and works well in a team that values open communication

job_description:
Roles & Responsibilites:
-- The Cloud Architect Lead is responsible for leading the creation of a technology framework and providing technical leadership in support of organization's initiatives in cloud computing and automation, with a focus on the design of systems and services that run on cloud platforms.
-- The Cloud Architect Lead reports into the Engineering and Architecture organization, but would be embedded into the Cloud-DevOps effort to provide architectural leadership and best practices.
-- Additionally, the Cloud Architect Lead will be responsible for ensuring that critical applications are designed and optimized for high availability and disaster recovery.
-- The position requires strong leadership and team-building skills, and must be able to collaborate effectively with a group of high performing individuals.
-- Demonstrate knowledge of cloud architecture and implementation features (OS, multi-tenancy, virtualization, orchestration, elastic scalability)
-- Demonstrate knowledge of DevOps tool chains and processes .
-- Act as a Subject Matter Expert to the organization for cloud end-to-end architecture, including AWS and future providers, networking, provisioning, and management.
-- Develop solutions architecture and evaluate architectural alternatives for private, public and hybrid cloud models, including IaaS, PaaS, and other cloud services.
-- Define optimal design patterns and solutions for high availability and disaster recovery for applications.
-- Drive scope definition, requirements analysis, functional and technical design, application build, product configuration, unit testing, and production deployment .
-- Ensure delivered solutions meet/perform to technical and functional/non-functional requirements.
-- Provide technical expertise and ownership in the diagnosis and resolution of an issue, including the determination and provision of workaround solution or escalation to service owners.
-- Ensure delivered solutions are realized in time frame committed; work in conjunction with project sponsors to size and manage scope and risk.
-- Provide support and technical governance, expertise related to cloud architectures, deployment, and operations.
NOTE: Must have a valid certification for any of the cloud services as AWS/Microsoft Azure/Google Cloud.

job_description:
Job Description :
AWS is one of Amazon's fastest growing businesses, servicing customers in more than 190 countries, reshaping the way global enterprises consume information technology and powering the developers who are building the next generation of global industry leaders. AWS customers include some of the most innovative startups like Netflix, Pinterest, Spotify, Airbnb, and Instagram as well as some of the largest global enterprises like Shell International, Unilever, Hitachi, Sharp, Bristol-Myers Squibb, and Samsung. Our business is growing at rapid rates and to support this growing demand for AWS Services across the globe, we need exceptionally talented, bright, and driven people. If you have a passion for working in a fast paced, dynamic environment and provide exceptional customer service, we'd like to hear from you!

The ASEAN Sales Operations team is looking for a highly skilled Program Manager, Business Operations and Planning. The Program Manager will be responsible for programmatically managing processes critical to our Go-To-Market strategy like Annual Planning and Headcount Management, as well as rolling out sales transformation programs revenue forecasting on Anaplan and integration of Salesforce with Anaplan. The individual will leverage business planning cycles and collaborate with stakeholders from APJ and Global Commercial Sales organization. The candidate should be able to create simple, scalable solutions to difficult problems, have excellent project-management skills, and must be able to communicate effectively and clearly with a wide range of stakeholders, both written and verbal. This is a hands-on position the ideal candidate must be willing to roll up their sleeves.

The ideal candidate needs to possess a keen business sense and exceptional analytical skills, is able to strategically and analytically think about business challenges and has experience in program management or planning for a B2B Sales organization. The candidate should be able to articulate and communicate clear value propositions across customers, partners, and within the AWS organization, and should be comfortable working across internal functions and geographies. The candidate will be a self-starter with a bias towards independent problem solving, a passion for identifying and eliminating bottlenecks, and has the foresight to anticipate business needs, make tradeoffs, and balance business dynamics despite constraints.
Basic Qualifications :
. At least 8+ years experience in Program Management, Strategy, Finance, Business Operations in a mid-to-large scale company.
. Demonstrated ability to conduct sophisticated and creative analysis of complex data and translate the results into actionable deliverables, clear written summaries, and region-wide communications.
. Demonstrated ability to define, refine and implement sales strategy and planning processes, procedures and policies and cross functional collaboration skills.
. Strong written and verbal communication skills, with a track record of presenting to senior management.
. Proven experience with the systems/tools utilized for business planning and reporting. Expert level in Excel.
. Strong prioritization skills, including driving multiple initiatives at the same time.
. Able to operate successfully in a lean, fast-paced organization, and to create a vision and organization that can scale quickly.
. Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Finance, Economics, Computer Science, or related field.
Preferred Qualifications :
. MBA or other relevant advanced degree.
. Experience with annual business planning process in a high-growth, technology company.
. Hands on experience with planning tools like Anaplan etc.
. Familiarity with cloud product and services, and sales cycles.
. Highly organized with multi-tasking skills efficient in ambiguous situations.
. Demonstrated ability to work across organizational boundaries.

job_description:
The Data Mining team in Singapore develops cutting edge algorithms and infrastructure for data mining and data verification in the context of autonomous driving. Our goal is to improve the on-road performance of products that use machine learning at their core by mining for errors, anomalies & long-tail events. We are looking for engineers passionate about autonomous driving technology and its potential impact to the world.
Motional's Machine Learning team has produced groundbreaking advancements in the autonomous vehicle industry including nuPlan (https://arxiv.org/abs/2106.11810), nuScenes (https://www.nuscenes.org), PointPillars (https://arxiv.org/abs/1812.05784), and PointPainting (http://arxiv.org/abs/1911.10150).
What you'll be doing:
Work on large-scale solutions for mining challenging driving scenarios which help boost model performance across various autonomous driving tasks
Collaborate with ML infrastructure teams and contribute to automated framework for continuous learning through iterative mining, training and deployment
Build dashboards around data verification use cases to maximize cost efficiency and throughput of data annotation pipeline
Develop distributed large-scale pipelines and optimize internal tools & open-source libraries to run efficiently and robustly at production level
What we're looking for:
MS in Computer Science, related quantitative field or equivalent experience
Experience architecting and deploying large-scale systems
Experience with tools for data manipulation, storage and visualization
Experience with dashboard building libraries for data analytics
Experience with core AWS services or similar cloud platforms
Experience with writing production-quality code in Python
At least 4 years of software development experience
Bonus points:
Experience with machine learning or statistical analysis
Experience with building infrastructure for machine learning
Experience with distributed systems design and architecture
Experience with high-performance system optimization and deployment

Job Description :

Roles and Responsibilities

We are looking for a highly motivated individual to join us and be part of the Singapore Infrastructure team, working with our business counterparts based out of different locations across Asia and Europe. The primary focus will be Mercedes-Benz Mobility Services and Center of Competence (CoC) Sales divisions where you will be supporting the business to maintain stability, transforming the applications, supporting the delivery of enhancements/new projects. You will collaborate with customers, transformation/transition teams, and digital foundation architects.

Building relationships to understand our customer is key. As a trusted technical advisor, you will use your interpersonal skills to influence a variety of stakeholders from technical teams to executives. You will help ensure their short-term technology decisions are aligned with their long-term goals. Speeding up the adoption of our services will be part of your day-to-day.

Your main responsibilities will include the following:

- Apply architectural principles and concepts to design and document solutions that meet business requirements.

- Work with the infrastructure partner teams to develop the solutions according to the defined design.

- Strong project management skills and project management software skills, including planning, organizing, and managing resources and budget.

- Set expectations for periodic and milestone reviews including status reports, project risk identification, and other dashboards.

- Working knowledge of cloud-native architectures like Azure, AWS, etc.

- Work with stakeholders to establish and gain consensus on project goals, objectives, and deliverables.

- Analyze current technologies used within the company and develop steps and processes to improve.

- Work with architectural leads in building highly resilient, scalable, secure, and cost-effective infrastructure for hosting the business applications.

- Good communication skills to help customers understand the impacts and benefits of technology, move the projects to the desired change state and help communicate transformation journeys.

- Responsible for translating customer needs, & technology opportunities into detailed technical offerings, solutions & proposals.

- Ensure timely update, maintenance of system documentation including system recovery and AR/DR documents.

- ITIL services management best practices, OLA, and SLA management knowledge.

- Foster a highly effective teamwork environment where accountability, clear effective communication, and a high level of customer service are demonstrated.

- Support multiple projects throughout the project lifecycles, manage conflicting priorities, deliverables, and schedules.

- Ensure adequate escalation management as part of the end-to-end service responsibility.

Skills:

- Minimum 6 years of experience in IT consulting (plan/build/run) on infrastructure services.

- Experience operating as a Solutions Architect with knowledge across different domains.

- Understanding of agile and waterfall methods and processes, and capability of supporting agile project teams by providing advice and guidance on opportunities, impact, and risks, taking account of technical and architectural debt.

- Knowledge of information security principles and best practices.

- Strong project management skills in working directly with an agile team.

The role partners with central demand marketing functions (e.g. demand and campaign teams within APJ, marketing operations) to create defined demand marketing plans that deliver maximum impact through a combination of tailored/localised global and new market-specific activities.

Has experience of leading with both a customer centric and an integrated marketing approach. Understands the agendas of CIOs, key decision makers and practitioners, including segment-aligned plans and programs. Is capable of driving the creation & execution of programs, as well as accurately measure impacts using best-in-class tools.

Ownership and accountability for the planning & execution of marketing programs to drive the pipeline & other defined goals / KPls for the SEAK market

In addition to a comprehensive suite of insurance plans, employee benefits, partnerships with Financial Advisor channels and bancassurance, Singlife with Aviva offers investment solutions through its dollarDEX and Navigator platforms.
The mobile-first Singlife Account with a Singlife Debit Card allows customers to save, spend, earn and be insured all in one app. Singlife with Aviva was formed by the merger of Aviva Singapore and Singlife. job_description:
At Deloitte, we offer a unique and exceptional career experience to inspire and empower talents like you to make an impact that matters for our clients, people and community. Deloitte offers you a highly inclusive, collaborative workplace and unrivalled opportunities to realize your full potential. We are always looking for people with the relentless energy to push themselves further, and to find new avenues and unique ways to reach our shared goals.
Work you will do

This role sits within the Customer and Marketing (C&M) team of Deloitte Southeast Asia, which is a part of Deloitte that uses technology and creativity to better connect the customer with the business.

Better known as Deloitte Digital, we use emergent technology to imagine, deliver, and run entirely new business futures. We create innovative ventures, digital platforms, and more meaningful experiences.
As part of the Digital Customer Team, you will leverage insight-driven strategies and advanced technology solutions to energize sales and service operations for digitally-powered growth and enhance our client's customer relationships with immersive experiences powered by leading digital arts. Eighty percent of the customer moments that make up their brand happen in the sales and service experience. We not only help our clients to make those memories for their customers, but we integrate their whole business around those momentswhether it's a trip into their supply chain, logistics, and fulfillment, or advancing the customer mindset of their employees and partners.
You will:
Be an expert in the Digital Sales and Marketing Automation domain to provide a deep understanding of the relevant Salesforce solution(s).
Responsible for business requirements, functional design, process design (including scenario design, flow mapping, customer journeys), prototyping, configuration, testing, training, defining support procedures.
Lead on the design, implementation of technology and creative business solutions for iconic brands.
Take the lead on projects, solving some of the most exciting problems for our clients.
Build lasting relationships with key client stakeholders and sponsors.
Collaborate with amazing digital experts across disciplines to innovate and create great solutions. Supporting the Digital team in RFP and proposal responses.
Enough about us, let's talk about you
If you are someone with:
- Tertiary qualification in a relevant technology, business, or marketing discipline.
- 3 - 8 years experience in consulting and/or CRM implementation in an enterprise environment.
- Functional or techno-functional expertise one or more of the following: Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Marketing Cloud. Development experience in Apex, VisualForce, Force.com or Java/J2EE and AMPScript. Relevant Salesforce certification(s) in Sales, Service and Marketing will be a plus.
- Experience contributing to RFP responses and other sales activities. Strong understanding of Agile / Iterative delivery methodology.
- Configure and implement integration with Salesforce Core and Marketing Cloud
- Drive and determination to continually learn new things and develop yourself.

Job Description :

Business Analyst, Worldwide Services Procurement

Everything in Dell Technologies is ground-breaking, from the designers of our products to the developers of our supply systems. Our Supply Chain team within Materials and Purchasing drives the development, implementation and management of supply chain operations and suppliers in the delivery of strategic programs. It's all about managing supplier relationships and ensuring the availability of parts and services in the supply chain, while maintaining inventory at acceptable levels. We focus our resources on the continuous improvement of the movement of materials through production processes and establishing key performance metrics and benchmarks relating to supply chain planning and forecasting.
Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a Business Analyst on our Worldwide Services Procurement team in Singapore.

What you'll achieve
Reporting to the Procurement Director (Services), this position will support sourcing and supplier management strategy. The individual will be responsible for spending, cost data collection and analysis. Working closely with Global Commodity Management and Global Supply Management team, this individual will have to work diligently and autonomously, and use strong business and financial acumen skills and analysis skills to determine the right decisions for Corporate Dell.

You will:
Support the development of a three-year strategy and planning process (long-range roadmaps, capacity analysis, etc.) for selected commodities.
Lead value chain analysis process for their commodity supply chains.
Collect product cost data as appropriate.
Report commodity cost and price variance monthly.
Creates financial spend plans, with supporting document on strategic initiatives to ensure delivery of the numbers.
Identify cost targets for relevant roadmap products.
Support to develop commodity strategy document.
Support to establish current business requirements and service strategy.
Participates in RTS readiness price review, post-mortem analysis, and process updates to support new products.
Participates on key projects to achieve strategic initiatives relating to sourcing & purchasing.


Take the first step towards your dream career
Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here's what we are looking for with this role:

Essential Requirements
Relevant Bachelors degree and first exposure to Procurement and Supply Chain Management
Oral fluency in Mandarin to liaise with our regional team members and partners
Thorough computer skills
Thorough data analysis skills
Thorough price/cost analysis skills
Strong interpersonal and communication skills


Desirable Requirements
Knowledge of the responsibilities and tasks performed by various procurement departments/disciplines
Good strategic/long-Range planning skills

job_description:
Job Description :

Data Center Sales, Technical GAM (DTS Singapore)
At Dell Technologies, we create the extraordinary. Our Outside Sales Product Specialists are the experts who sell innovation to the world. Responsible for a set of products and services, they get to know their portfolio inside and out. Our Outside Sales teams rely on them for technical advice during the sales process. They directly advise customers on everything from product features and configurations, through to pricing and availability.
Join us as a Data Center Sales, Technical GAM on our Outside Sales team in Singapore to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact.
What you'll achieve
The Data Center Sales, Technical GAM (DTS Singapore) role will be responsible for managing the largest / most strategic / complex Dell Technologies accounts. The role will manage a Global Account with Decision Making in Singapore - interaction will be long term strategic, involve both technical and senior leadership relationship management. He/she will be able to successfully connect technology solutions to both the customer business challenges and opportunities to achieve customer value & superior experience, whilst achieving business / sales goals.
The Data Center Sales, GAM leads a team across both virtually and cross functionally, effective communication and collaboration is key. This is the ideal position for someone looking to work in both a domestic and global role simultaneously. Technology focus will be on Compute / Networking / HCI / related Services & Consulting with a focus on workloads and outcome-based selling. This role is generally assigned to 1-2 accounts / a vertical industry, key success criteria include strong technical & consultative skills.

You will:

Successfully manage the complexities of a large account regionally.

Propose and develop key customer product solutions

Generate new business opportunities while maintaining relationship with existing business

Communicate regularly with customers to deepen relationship and trust with Dell

Proactively customize solutions based on customer needs and pain points

8-10 years of Outside Sales experience from high tech industry

Job Description :

Internship (MBA) - Complexity Management (6 months)

Everything in Dell Technologies is ground-breaking, from the designers of our products to the developers of our supply systems. The Global Operations (GO) organization within Dell drives the development, implementation and management of operations and suppliers in the delivery of strategic programs. We focus our resources on the continuous improvement of the movement of materials through production processes and establishing key performance metrics and benchmarks relating to supply chain planning and forecasting.
The Complexity Management arm within GO is a team of in-house strategists working together with the business on strategic resource optimization and design-to-leverage initiatives. Work is typically organized around project-based engagements and you will be working with talents from various backgrounds, including but not limited to management consultants, research analysts, supply chain experts and marketing professionals.
You will work on 1-2 projects, and the focus could be one of the following
Driving data centralization between Global Ops Complexity Management and Product Group Complexity team, and data automation to streamline our day-to-day operation by creating advanced dashboards and various digitization features
Evaluating/ analyzing commodity-related requests, providing recommendations to facilitate executive decision making, and delivering executive readout on commodity complexity and leverage status
Creating SKU governance guidelines to optimize supply chain efficiencies and customer "easy-to-choose" strategies to drive offer simplifications

This position offers
Opportunity to learn about Dell's latest innovations and client base and drive cutting-edge strategies for one of the industry's largest technology companies
Access to functional and industry experts through executive speaker series, lunch-n-learns and 1x1 coffee chats
Potential full-time offer post co-op completion

Essential requirements are
Strong Excel and PowerPoint skills VBA programming is a plus
Analytical skills to conduct scenario analysis, build and validate business case, and make data driven decisions
Interpersonal skills to engage stakeholders, resolve conflicts, and manage ambiguity/ complexity
Story-lining and presentation skills to clearly frame and communicate messages
Project management skills to drive end-to-end solutions to complex problems
Technical skills in SQL, R, Python, Power BI, Tableau

Optional requirements are
MBA Candidate graduating in 2022 with strong academic credentials (minimum GPA 3.5/4.0) and leadership roles in clubs or extra-curricular activities
2 years of full-time work experience in management consulting, strategy, research, client management or banking roles
Prior experience in complexity reduction/optimization functions in PC / electronics industry

Do you dream of working in a company that is driven by a meaningful purpose An inclusive company that empowers you to do your best and be innovative
At Schneider Electric, we believe access to energy and digital is a basic human right. We empower all to do more with less, ensuring Life Is On everywhere, for everyone, at every moment. We provide energy and automation digital solutions for efficiency and sustainability.
We are looking for Schneider Graduate Program (SGP) Associates to make a difference and be part of our digital transformation!

Onboard early June 2022

job_description:
Motional is a driverless technology company making self-driving vehicles a safe, reliable, and accessible reality.
The Motional team is made up of engineers, researchers, innovators, dreamers and doers, who together are creating a first-of-its-kind technology with the potential to transform the way we move. We're behind some of the industry's largest leaps forward, including the first fully-autonomous cross-country drive in the U.S, the launch of the world's first robotaxi pilot, and operation of the world's most-established public robotaxi fleet.
As a leader in an emerging industry that has the promise of creating safer, more reliable and accessible transportation for all, it's imperative we have a diverse workforce, create an inclusive culture, and understand the communities we operate in around the world.
About this position
We are seeking a talented Backend Software Engineer to help develop and roll out the next generation of our advanced tools to support autonomous driving. We are building a suite of fleet management products to enable the successful operation of our Autonomous Vehicles at scale. The core of the Fleet Autonomy Services (FAS) platform is built around our real-time data pipeline which enables our AVs to communicate with our cloud services. Our team develops products such as real-time monitoring platform for the AV fleet, vehicle software update services, and integrations with ride hailing partners.
What You'll Be Doing
Design, build and maintain our FAS platform for our autonomous vehicle fleet
Write high quality, maintainable code
Assist with high-level analysis, design, and code reviews
Communicate with stakeholders and other team leads to identify system requirements
Manage product delivery timelines
Hands-on implementation of key portions of the system
What We're Looking For
3+ years of professional work experience as a software engineer in designing and building distributed systems
Experience with serverless architectures
Experience building systems using SQL and NoSQL databases
Strong written and oral communication skills
MS, BS or BA in Computer Science / Engineering
Comfortable working in a fast-paced, continuous delivery environment
Experience with Amazon Web Services, Docker, and Terraform
Bonus Points (not required)
Experience with IoT infrastructure
Experience with Python / Golang
Experience with JavaScript / React / Redux

job_description:
The Platform Service Engineer role is a member of Platform Service Enablement team within the Regional Delivery Centre (RDC) based in Singapore that focuses on delivering key global services to member firms across Asia Pacific region (ASPAC region), in the most cost efficient and effective way.
The primary function of this role is to delivery cloud based platform services such as Microsoft Azure IaaS, PaaS and common IT platform services to enable greater agility with fulfillment of the firm's growth initiatives.
Job scope:
Provides IT operation support and maintains the operational steady state.
Support and maintain a delivery platform that provides the stability, scalability and availability demands of the business through infrastructure lifecycle, improvement and standardization strategies.
Responsible for ASPAC RDC's operation environment management as per the firm's technology standard, policy requirements, procedures or industry best practices.
Lead or participate in system, business solution or new technology implementation projects as subject matter expert.
Assist ASPAC member firms with network integration and migration requirements.
Serve as the Technical Support expert and capable of handling escalations, incidents, outages and platform related challenges.
Assist with implementing upgrade/refresh programs, customer deployments/migrations and regular patching.
Ongoing management and delivery of Azure Environments to agreed OLA (Operation Level Agreement) and SLA (Service Level Agreement).
Stay current with technology through continued education, professional association, networking and coordinating regular software and hardware evaluations.
Requirements:
Bachelor's degree from an accredited college/university or equivalent professional experience.
Proficient verbal and written communication skills.
Minimum of 2 years proven experience on platform services operation or service provisioning: Microsoft server operation systems, core IT infrastructure, WAN & LAN networking, Firewall and Network Proxy, Storage and Backup.
Working knowledge of ITIL processes, change management and project management.
Ability to collaborate with other IT disciplines (e.g. Storage, Platform, Application) to troubleshoot and resolve complex problems.
Cross skilled and able to support the Cloud System stack comprising of Server, Backups, Storage, Network & Application layers.
Microsoft Azure IaaS and PaaS experience in configuring, provisioning and deploying solutions specifically at the network layer is required.
Awareness of other Public cloud services (e.g. AWS, GCP) suitable for an enterprise environment is a plus.

Capable of strategic thinking and of moving strategic plans into action.
Highly self-motivated and able to effectively execute tasks in a high-pressure environment.

company: Seventh Sense Artificial Intelligence Private Limited
tech_stack: Machine Learning  MongoDB  Kubernetes  REST  MySQL  Flask  Python  Vc  Docker  Aws Lambda  Databases  Defense  Architectural  SageMaker  Embedded Systems  FastAPI
job_description:
About Us
Seventh Sense is an Edge-AI startup, democratizing AI. At Seventh Sense, we are solving the problem of running computationally intensive deep learning (AI) without the need for costly GPUs or Cloud. We make it possible to get GPU-class machine vision performance on commoditized hardware such as ubiquitous CPUs, mCPUs, embedded systems, and compute-constrained devices. This technology enables us to build our products which help in making our world a safer place.
Our Face Recognition engine accuracy is ranked amongst the top in NIST, LFW,IJB-C, and other benchmarks.
Co-founders have 2-decades of experience, each, and have a track record which includes successful exits one was acquired by McAfee/Intel, and second was registered on a Stock Exchange.
We are backed by well-known US based VC investors and recognized local investors, such as CapVista (the strategic investment arm of Singapore's Defense, Science and Technology Agency within Ministry of Defense).
Job Description
We are looking for a backend engineer to work closely with our product and machine learning teams to develop solutions for on-premise and dedicated cloud applications on top of our cutting-edge software. As a backend engineer, you should be comfortable with back-end coding languages, development frameworks, and third-party libraries. If you are someone who wants to contribute to solving challenging technical problems with exposure to the forefront of deep learning, this is the role for you!
The role will also require collaborating with project and product teams to transfer ideas into product solutions and applications.
Background
Proven experience in backend development (3+ years)
Strong programming skills with proven experience implementing Python based backends
Familiarity with databases (e.g. PostgresSQL, MySQL)
Experience with REST APIs (Flask, FastAPI)
Knowledge of AWS Cloud architecture and services such as AWS Lambda, AWS Sagemaker, AWS Elastic Search
Knowledge of container and scaling solutions (e.g. Docker, Kubernetes)
Ability to interpret and implement research ideas and algorithms
Creative, collaborative, and innovation-focused
Strong sense of project ownership and personal responsibility
. Degree in Computer Science, Statistics or relevant field
Benefits
Health Care Plan
Paid Time Off (Vacation, Sick & Public Holidays)
Family Leave (Maternity, Paternity)
Short Term & Long-Term Disability
Training & Development
Work From Home
Financial rewards for successful IP filings, and published papers
Stock Option Plan
Opportunities for international relocation and transfer

- Extensive hands-on experience in scoping, pre-requisite & setup of Data Infrastructure products in virtual cloud environment covering Configurations of Hardware, OS Internals, Database, Application Software package, Network Ports/Firewall & Security constructs

job_title: Senior Demand Generation Rep, PH Enterprise
job_description:
DESCRIPTION

Job summary
Amazon Web Services (AWS), an Amazon.com Company, has been the world's leading cloud provider for more than 15 years with the most mature, comprehensive, and broadly adopted cloud platform. AWS has over 200 fully featured cloud services, managed from 81 availability zones within 25 geographic regions across the globe. Millions of customers in over 190 countries - from the fastest growing startups to the largest enterprises, through to leading government agencies - all place their trust in AWS to power their infrastructure, and deliver innovation.

At AWS, we refer to ourselves as builders. We are looking for more builders to join our growing and diverse teams in ASEAN. Learn more about a career opportunity as a Demand Generation Representative (DGR) at AWS ASEAN.

As a DGR for the Philippine Enterprise market, you are an important member of the sales and marketing organization. You will be the frontline for our enterprise customers in their new/early stage of cloud adoption, and connect their key stakeholders to AWS. This role will actively identify and hunt key decision makers from targeted customers and leverage lead sources from various AWS marketing, sales, and external databases and help the customers start their transformational journey. DGR will profile, nurture and qualify customer leads by understanding their business issues and proposing solutions to their problems with AWS services. This role is our brand custodian who will support our customers, partners and end-users as they work with AWS and utilize our cloud technology to innovate and improve their business outcomes.

ABOUT THIS ROLE
As builders, we are here to build long-term relationships with our customers. In this role, you will Learn and Be Curious (see Amazon Leadership Principles) about the entire portfolio of AWS products and services. As a trusted advisor who is Customer Obsessed, you will listen to our customers to understand their needs, and propose AWS solutions who can solve their problems. Through customer engagements, you will identify potential sales opportunities with effective questioning and listening skills. With a strong Bias for Action, once you have qualified sales opportunities, you will follow the opportunity management processes to ensure that opportunities are handed over to appropriate sales team members, so that we can address our customers needs in a timely manner. Your success will be measured by the achievement of your opportunity creation goals.

Want to know more about what it's like to be part of our ASEAN Team at AWS Hear from our builders: ASEAN Builders

Basic Qualifications
. Professional fluency in English and Tagalog, both written and verbal
. Experiences in sales or demand generation within the technology sector
. Sales/business development experience with Indonesian enterprise customers
. Proven success in managing time and juggling multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment where priorities shift quickly
. Clear, concise and confident communicator in-person and via phone
. Ability to profile customers from various internal/external sources to attain key business contacts
. Ability to listen to customers, understand needs, and ask clarifying/probing questions.
. Ability to think logically and structure answers, and ability to deal with ambiguity.

Preferred Qualifications
. Degree or technical background in engineering, computer science, or technology specialization (Big Data, Analytics, AI, Digital Transformation, Machine Learning)
. Foundational knowledge and understanding of existing and developing technologies that relate to cloud computing
. Experience navigating prospective accounts to reach senior executive levels to identify new customer opportunities
. Skilled at presenting technical solutions to prospects and customers

What if I'm not an expert in all the above That's okay. We hire people who have a passion for learning, and are curious to build, learn and grow. You will be supported in your career development here at AWS. You will have plenty of opportunities to build your technical, leadership, business and consulting skills. This will include formal and on the job training, and a chance to learn and upskill through AWS certification courses and mentorship. You will learn from and collaborate with some of the brightest technical minds in the industry today.

If you want to work with the best cloud technologies from the world's leading cloud provider, apply now. We can't wait to see what you build here. Come build the future with AWS.

CULTURE AND COMMITMENT TO INCLUSION, DIVERSITY & EQUITY

At AWS, we welcome all builders. We believe that technology should be built in a way that's inclusive, accessible, and equitable. We're committed to putting in the work for more equal representation

Amazon is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. Amazon is an equal opportunity employer, and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, age, or other legally protected status.

company: National Cancer Centre Of Singapore Pte Ltd
tech_stack: Unix Shell  Python  Proteomics  Team Worker  Cell  high performance computing  Bioinformatics  Business Analytics  Statistics  computational biology
job_description:
We have two immediate available positions for Bioinformatics.
You will be part of an established and nationally funded multi-disciplinary and multi-institution research program that focuses on liver cancer (hepatocellular carcinoma, HCC) and other cancers. You will also play a key role in a large-scale international translational and clinical study on HCC that prospectively collect various types of patient biosamples. The program utilizes cutting-edge research technologies and employs radiomics and multi-omics approaches focused on next-generation sequencing (NGS), cfDNA NGS, single cell RNAseq and proteomics, CyTOF, 3D spatial transcriptomics, and targeted/untargeted metabolomics as well as clinical and radiological imaging datasets in the context of a clinical cohort. The candidate will also be expected to establish and work within a sandbox environment.
Your responsibilities will include the following:
- Assist the Principal Investigator in conceptualizing and designing research projects.
- Work collaboratively with scientific and clinical staff on multi-omics and radiomics data processing, statistical analyses, feature extraction for statistical/machine learning and survival analysis, and other relevant computational analyses to better understand the complexity of HCC by using various analytics tools and setting up analysis pipelines.
- Responsible for the coordination and management of the projects in the multidisciplinary study.
The job allows tremendous opportunities for professional growth and development and opportunities to publish in high-impact journals.
Requirements:
- PhD degree in Computational Biology or a quantitative background (e.g. Statistics, Physics, Engineering), or Biomedical-related disciplines with a strong evidence of computational and/or image feature extraction experience.
- Experience with large-scale bioinformatics analysis (including, but not restricted to NGS, single cell sequencing, cfDNA analysis, radiomics analysis, survival analysis and disease modelling).
- Proficient in R (tidyverse, ggplot, bioconductor) or Python (pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn) and good knowledge of Unix shell.
- Knowledge with high performance computing (HPC) and cloud computing (AWS) will be an advantage.
- Experience and knowledge in database management and data architecture will be an advantage.
- Possess excellent analytical, technical and problem-solving skills.
- Well organized and detail oriented.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
- Able to work with diverse groups of people.
- Good team worker and fast learner.
Candidates with MSc in Computational Biology or related discipline but with significant research experience may be considered.

job_description:
APAC Operations Head (SVP) - Secrets Management Platforms
As a bank with a brain and a soul, Citi creates economic value that is systemically responsible and in our clients best interests. As a financial institution that touches every region of the world and every sector that shapes your daily life, our Enterprise Operations & Technology teams are charged with a mission that rivals any large tech company. Our technology solutions are the foundations of everything we do. We keep the bank safe and provide the technical tools our workers need to be successful. We design our digital architecture and ensure our platforms provide a first-class customer experience. Our operations teams manage risk, resources, and program management. We focus on enterprise resiliency and business continuity. We develop, coordinate, and execute strategic operational plans. Essentially, Enterprise Operations & Technology re-engineers client and partner processes to deliver excellence through secure, reliable, and controlled services.
Trust is part of our DNA at Citi. As such, we take safeguarding our customer data very seriously. The Chief Information Security Office (CISO) is made up of deeply dedicated and talented colleagues who work together to ensure the safety of Citi's and our clients assets and information. We manage information security as an end-to-end program one with a clear mandate and accountability. Our mission is to continually execute and enhance a global security program that is fully anchored to modern control and security frameworks, fully aligned with the technology of the firm, threat-focused and data-driven, and deeply integrated across all Citi businesses globally.
Being talent-driven, we are focused on attracting, developing, and retaining diverse and inclusive talent with a high technical skill level. As a member of our team we will provide you with career development opportunities at all stages of your career. Our employees model a passion for protecting Citi and our clients and believe in treating others with dignity and respect.
This is an opportunity to work with Global Secrets Management Platforms team which is part of Citi's Cyber Security Services. This team is responsible for secrets management on-prem and the cloud for applications across the firm.
Our commitment to diversity includes a workforce that represents the clients we serve globally from all walks of life, backgrounds, and origins. We foster an environment where the best people want to work. We value and demand respect for others, promote individuals based on merit, and ensure opportunities for personal development are widely available to all. Ideal candidates are innovators with well-rounded backgrounds who bring their authentic selves to work and complement our culture of delivering results with pride. If you are a problem solver who seeks passion in your work, come join us. We'll enable growth and progress together.
APAC Operations Head (SVP) - Secrets Management Platforms
The Global Identity and Access Management (GIAM) Secrets Management Platforms - APAC Operations Head is a senior management level role which will be responsible for the management of various L3 functions in the region such as Infrastructure, Integrations, Operations and Strategic Initiatives.
If you have a strong background in Cyber Security and consider yourself a technology leader with excellent communication skills, have a wide variety of skillset including a firm grasp on operating systems, cloud technologies, hands on experience managing large enterprise security Infrastructure, then Citi is a place for you to be, as we offer the environment where skills like these can thrive.
Responsibilities:
Manage various franchise critical security application Infrastructure, specifically in secrets and privileged access management domain.
Drive the deployment (from scratch), maintenance and L3 support of managed application infrastructure with end to end accountability.
Lead a group of highly talented technical leads and SMEs (subject matter experts) in the region responsible for various L3 functions.
Continuously assess and modernize processes and workforce to match with current industry standards.
Collaborate with various product stakeholders, business senior leaders and vendors to design secure, scalable, and easy to consume security solutions for client applications.
Lead and manage a 24x7x365 operations team spread across various countries in the region, provide technical and senior management oversight.
Communicate vision and motivate the organization to achieve high performance and continuous improvement of all the aspects of Infrastructure support and associated processes.
Develop framework to successfully manage the various operational groups and environments hosting the secrets and PAM Infrastructure.
Work with various vendors and internal support groups to ensure application technology stack remains current in terms of product versions and industry standards.
Facilitate the research, design and development of the state-of-the-art integration and product lifecycle processes to simplify product deployment and business onboarding.
Lead the team through external/internal audit/compliance assessments and reviews to ensure product compliance
Lead Infrastructure projects and facilitate security assessment and remediation for the infrastructure associated the applications in scope.
Proven ability to work with demanding global partners within aggressive timelines; solid problem solving, analytical and technical abilities.
Qualifications:
10+ years of demonstrated experience in Cyber Security.
Bachelor's in Engineering Degree (Computer Science or Equivalent) or Master's Degree
Critical Competencies:
Strong leadership and people management skills focusing on development and growth of the team
Strong interpersonal and communication skills
Results-oriented with ability to conceive and execute business operations plans, drive positive changes to optimize operational processes.
Proven ability to prioritize business objectives and effectively manage multiple functions and projects.
Strong aptitude for the design and delivery of processes; customer focused.
Experience managing secrets/PAM solutions as subject matter expert/technical lead. CyberArk and/or HashiCorp Vault experience will be a plus.
Domain knowledge in Privileged Access Management (PAM) and secrets management.
Experience in Design and implementation of automation framework using DevOps/DevSecOps methodologies.
Experience working with containers and associated technologies like Kubernetes/OpenShift with good understanding of the entire tech stack.
Good understanding of various encryption, PKI, HSM and data protection technologies to secure and harden Infrastructure and associated components.
Understanding of various programing languages, middleware technologies and major operating systems to efficiently drive the product lifecycle and interface with various business end points.
Hands on experience in deployment of product in Hybrid cloud environments.
Experience with implementation of solution in various cloud environments, preferably AWS, GCP.
Integration experience with Physical and/or Virtual HSMs.
Experience with Web Services, Microservices architecture, API Gateways.
Experience interacting with Web APIs using various protocols and framework (E.g. REST)
Experience with RDBMS or NoSQL databases from application programmer's perspective.
Integration experience with APM, various monitoring, SIEM tools.

job_description:
About Envision Digital:
Envision Digital is focused on bringing technology solutions to the sustainability challenge . Its world-class AIoT technology helps governments and companies across the world accelerate progress toward a net zero future and improve their citizens quality of life. Having established itself as a leading solutions provider for intelligent renewable energy generation, consumption efficiency and smart flexible storage, it has extended its capabilities beyond energy to enable and optimise applications notably in smart cities, smart buildings and estates, smart infrastructures, e-mobility and smart plants.
EnOS, Envision Digital's proprietary AIoT operating system, connects and manages more than 100 million smart devices and 200 gigawatts of energy assets globally, while its growing ecosystem of more than 350 customers and partners spans 10 industries and includes Accenture, Amazon Web Services, GovTech Singapore, Keppel Corporation, Microsoft, Nissan, PTT, Sonnen, Solarvest and Total. The company has around 700 employees and 12 offices across China, France, Japan, Germany, Norway, the Netherlands, the United Kingdom, and the United States, with headquarters in Singapore.
Envision Digital International (EDI) is seeking a Level 2 SOC Analyst that will join our Cyber Security Operations Center team. This is an intermediate role that will be closely working with the internal CERT for incident response.
L2 SOC Analyst is an operational role, focusing on real-time security event monitoring and security incident investigation. As an L2 SOC Analyst, you will proactively hunt security threats and risks involving EDI's infrastructure. More specifically, the key responsibilities are the following:
to manage incidents at all phases (triage, investigation and mitigation and remediation).
to be a professional point of contact for the L1 team
to receive escalation and manage incidents
to escalate timely when the SLA for alerting is not met
to identify the incidents if there are any missed by SOC operators
to interact with external parties to resolve the queries relating to the raised incidents
to generate the daily reports, weekly reports, and monthly reports on time
to maintain the timely delivery of reports
to maintain the updated and latest log baselines
to act as Threat Hunter
JOB SCHEDULE
24x7 in the Cybersecurity Operations Center EDI's office
Must-Have:
Minimum 3 years of working experience on an Incident ResponseForensic or any advanced SOC activities.
Good understanding of security best practices and concepts, architectures and platforms.
Knowledge of Windows and/or Unix-based systems/architectures and related security
Knowledge in Public Cloud security.
Enthusiastic to learn the Operational Technology (AIoT, IIoT), Edge, and Cloud technologies
Scripting abilities.
Problem-solving skills.
Initiative and proactive attitude.
Team player attitude.
Willing to work on an on-call basis for an urgent matter
Capable of meeting and exceeding Service Level Agreements (SLAs) as required per contract Flexibility agility to support a 24-hour a day/365 days/year operation.
Nice to have:
Cybersecurity certification
Bsc in relevant field
Experience in defining Threat Hunting analytics (network and endpoints).
experience in PT and attack simulation
Understanding and familiarly with CIERT, NIST, CIS, ISO27001,Mitre frameworks

tech_stack: Tensorflow  Machine Learning  MongoDB  Vmware  Software Engineering  Computer Vision  Data Mining  Pytorch  Software Design  Itil  massive  Segmentation  Active Directory  3D  Rapid Prototyping  Publications
job_description:
The Auto Labeling team in Singapore develops a powerful Offline Perception system to label the daily drive logs automatically. We are specialized in perception, semi-supervised learning, massive deep neural networks, large scale training and deployment to make an impact across perception, prediction, planning and data mining. We are looking for engineers and researchers to join us to further improve the Auto Labeling system.
Motional's Machine Learning team has produced groundbreaking advancements in the autonomous vehicle industry including nuPlan (https://arxiv.org/abs/2106.11810), nuScenes (https://www.nuscenes.org), PointPillars (https://arxiv.org/abs/1812.05784), and PointPainting (http://arxiv.org/abs/1911.10150)
What You'll Be Doing:
Contribute to the state-of-the-art Offline Perception system
Research and solve the challenging problem of large scale training for machine learning models with extremely large capacity
Create an automated pipeline to train, evaluate and deploy machine learning models in the cloud
Speed up the inference of our Offline Perception system using TorchScript and TensorRT
Conduct deep learning experiments, write tech reports, and file patents
What We're Looking For :
Masters or PhD in Computer Science or a related field with 2+ years of relevant experience
Advanced knowledge of Computer Vision and Machine Learning
Experience of large scale distributed training for deep learning models, including: object classification, object detection, semantic segmentation, etc.
Good knowledge of software engineering principles including software design, source control management, build processes, code reviews and testing methods
Experience with PyTorch, TensorFlow or other deep learning frameworks
Passion about self-driving technology and its potential impact on the world
Strong communication and interpersonal skills
Bonus points:
Experience with 3D object detection and lidar data
Experience with high performance libraries such as FairScale or DeepSpeed
Proven track record of publications in relevant conferences (e.g. CVPR, ICML, NeurIPS, ICCV, ICLR)
Leadership and mentoring experience

job_description:
About Standard Chartered
We are a leading international bank focused on helping people and companies prosper across Asia, Africa and the Middle East.
To us, good performance is about much more than turning a profit. It's about showing how you embody our valued behaviours - do the right thing, better together and never settle - as well as our brand promise, Here for good.
We're committed to promoting equality in the workplace and creating an inclusive and flexible culture - one where everyone can realise their full potential and make a positive contribution to our organisation. This in turn helps us to provide better support to our broad client base.
The Role Responsibilities

Our engineering team aims to build modern digital solutions in the Wealth Management space. We constantly strive to reduce time-to-market and streamline our development processes. As part of the team you will directly collaborate with business stakeholders on regular basis to devise and implement solutions incrementally in short iterations. We follow the agile methodology with continuous delivery practices and expect you to actively participate in our continuous improvement process.
Your responsibility will be to collaboratively take part in all aspects of software delivery: planning, design, implementation, refactoring, testing, automation, integration, release, monitoring, and troubleshooting. You will be constantly learning and sharing your knowledge with your peers. We value specialized expertise, however we request everyone on the team to be curious, open-minded, and proactive problem solver.

Our Ideal Candidate


8 or more years of experience with Java/Go/Python development

2 or more years of experience with Angular/AngularJS/ReactJS

Experience using frameworks such as SpringBoot/GoMicro/Kit for microservices development

2 or more years of experience with full-stack design patterns and designing loosely coupled architectures

5 or more years of varied DB experience (e.g. RDBMS and NoSQL databases)

Experience in an Agile/Scrum team environment

Experience working with Test Driven Development and Unit Test Frameworks


What Makes You Stand Out
Other areas of experience or interest that will help us place you on the right team include:

Experience with DevOps principles and lean development such as Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (Jenkins, etc.)

Experience with git principles and tools such as Bitbucket.

Knowledge of Market data and experience integrating it.

Experience configuring and implementing system execution/quality monitoring tools like Grafana, Graylog, SonarQube, etc.


Interpersonal, Leadership and Teaming Competencies

Capable of collaborating with multiple business stakeholders to provide information technology solution

Skilled in interpersonal communications, negotiation, and conflict resolution


Education (or equivalent workexperience)
Ideally, you will have a degree or equivalent work experience in the following:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or equivalent work experience in delivering technical tools, algorithms, and data structures

job_description:
Job Summary
The primary role of Cloud Infrastructure Engineer is to support technology-enabled business strategies and operations to drive increased agility, scalability, fault tolerance and improve service quality of the Technology Operations, Infrastructure and Cloud team. The role is to engage with Application, Engineering and Infrastructure Technology teams to help them achieve extensive business value, by migrating and modernizing technology landscapes to Cloud to create a platform for innovation and Enterprise Transformation.
Your responsibility as an Infrastructure Cloud Engineer will be to manage and ensure optimal performance of the organization's cloud infrastructure. You'll be involved in the planning and design of the cloud infrastructure, as well as in troubleshooting any issues.
You will:
? Work in tandem with our infrastructure team to identify and implement the most optimal cloud-based solutions for the company
? Define and document best practices and strategies regarding application deployment and infrastructure maintenance
? Provide guidance, thought leadership and mentorship to development teams to build cloud competencies
? Ensure application performance, uptime, and scale, maintaining high standards of code quality and thoughtful design
? Managing cloud environments in accordance with company security guidelines
Key Responsibilities
The scope of responsibilities includes the following
? Develop and implement technical efforts to design, build, and deploy AWS applications
? Automate the manual efforts in the provision of cloud resources
? Troubleshoot incidents, identify root cause, fix and document problems, and implement preventive measures
? Educate teams on the implementation of new cloud-based initiatives, providing associated training as required
? Adopt best practices with regards to managing AWS cloud infrastructure
? Employ exceptional problem-solving skills, with the ability to see and solve issues before they affect business productivity
? Proactively monitor the performance of the Cloud resources
? Manage costs of cloud infrastructure to ensure no wastage and takes full advantage of cost saving mechanisms.
? Working as part of a cross functional team to identify, develop, and lead IT Infrastructure & Operation Transformation activities
? Defining and executing on the technology migration strategy by engaging highly technical teams within SPHTech (other Solutions Architects, Technical Account Managers, professional services consultants and consulting/managed services partners) to define migration pathways.
Requirements:
? Degree in Computer Science or equivalent
? Minimum 5 years of experience in managing AWS environment is a must
? Minimum 3 years of experience architecting, designing, developing, and implementing cloud solutions on AWS platforms
? Minimum 2 years of hands-on experience in using cloud formation or terraform to provision AWS resources for the application
? Good cloud infrastructure technical knowledge including cloud formation and cost optimization
? Well versed in cloud security baseline and management
? Good knowledge of and ability to make use of most of the AWS resources such as EC2, RDS, ALB, Code Pipeline, ElasticCache, Auto-scaling Group, S3, VPC, EKS, ECS, Cloudfront, Route53, CloudWatch, Lambda
? Good knowledge of JSON, YAML, Git, CI/CD tools eg Jenkins
? Well verse in infrastructure security baseline and management
? Knowledge of information technology infrastructure domains such as compute server platforms, storage server platforms, server components, network devices, technologies and architectures, IT service delivery principles and best practices
? Familiarity with compliance & security standards across the enterprise IT landscape
? Professional certifications:
o AWS Solutions Architect - Associate or AWS SysOps - Associate is a must
o IT Service Management (ITIL) best practices, Agile and Devops is an advantage
? Effective communicator at all levels of the organisation and outside with third parties
? Good communication skills both written and verbal.
? Problem solving and root cause identification skills. Strong analytic and decision-making abilities.
? Must be a team player and able to work with and through others.
? Ability to work in a multicultural environment
? Integrity & Self Development (live up to commitments; seek feedback to enhance
performance; deal constructively with own mistakes).
? Customer-Oriented

job_description:
As a member of our Production Support team, you'll immediately put your love of technology into action. Each day, you and your team will be responsible for making sure our platforms, servers and networks are online and secure. You'll work together, evaluating, selecting, implementing, integrating, maintaining, upgrading, documenting and designing our infrastructure. You'll find new and creative solutions to troubleshoot and resolve issues. Communication is key, both in problem solving with your supervisors and collaborating with your coworkers, as well as other teams in the network.
The CTC Production Support team is seeking a systems administrator that combines both software and systems administration to operate and manage large-scale, massively distributed, fault tolerant systems. The Candidate will build and implement creative solutions to operations problems, including optimizing existing systems, building infrastructure, Capacity and Resilience management and eliminating work through automation. The candidate will work with various cross-functional teams, and must be able to work in a global team setting and adapt to dynamic requirements. As an administrator, you are responsible for the visualization of how our systems relate to each other while using our production tools to identify and resolve a broad spectrum of problems.
This position is anticipated to require the use of one or more High Security Access (HSA) systems. Users of these systems are subject to enhanced screening which includes both criminal and credit background checks, and/or other enhanced screening at the time of accepting the position and on an annual basis thereafter. The enhanced screening will need to be successfully completed prior to commencing employment or assignment.
Responsibilities:
Develop solutions to automate manual operational task.
Run, maintain and improve the service against established Service Level Objectives by applying software engineering principles
Responsible for the availability, performance, change management, monitoring, and capacity management of their services
Engage in with the development team throughout the life cycle to help build for reliability
Troubleshoot priority incidents, conduct flawless post-mortems and ensure permanent closure
Analyze patterns of incidents, develop permanent remediation plans, and implement automation to prevent future incidents from occurring through software engineering.
Facilitates maximum speed of delivery by objectively binding to disruptions of the service
Manage the efforts to split between manual operational work and engineering work
Part of the 24x7x365 support coverage
Qualifications:
BA/BS degree.
Minimum 7 years of relevant experience.
Strong platform skills (Linux, UNIX and Windows)
Experience in Incident, Change and Problem management process in an large scale operations
Experience with integrating solutions in a multi-vendor environment, including SaaS environments
Experience in performance engineering and monitoring using tools such as AppDynamics, Splunk, Apica, Jmeter and Dynatrace
Experience with Automation and Configuration tools like Ansible, Puppet, Chef or Evolven.
Experience with Agile and full software development life cycle disciplines
Proven ability to understand and troubleshoot complex problems under pressure
Experience working in an Agile Development environment.
Experience with scripting languages (e.g., bash, PowerShell) to automate tasks and manipulate data
Experience with one or more general purpose programming languages (e.g. Python, Java)
Experience with Capacity and Resilience management practices and procedures is beneficial
Knowledge of networking protocols is beneficial.
Industry recognized security certifications (security, networking, etc.) strongly preferred
Experience with Splunk in one of the following areas: IT Operations, compliance, Dev-Ops, network security, and system security, supporting security event management tools (SIEMs)
Working knowledge of Splunk Cloud solution offering not required but preferred
Good working knowledge of Cloud Engineering. Understanding of private cloud principles and exposure to public cloud offerings such as AWS, Azure, Cloud Foundry or similar technology is preferred
Our CTC Production Support Organization is filled with innovators who love technology as much as you do. Together, you'll use a disciplined, innovative and cost-effective approach to deliver a wide variety of high-quality products and services. You'll work in a stable, resilient and secure operating environment where youand the products you deliverwill thrive.

About Standard Chartered
We are a leading international bank focused on helping people and companies prosper across Asia, Africa and the Middle East.
To us, good performance is about much more than turning a profit. It's about showing how you embody our valued behaviours - do the right thing, better together and never settle - as well as our brand promise, Here for good.
We're committed to promoting equality in the workplace and creating an inclusive and flexible culture - one where everyone can realise their full potential and make a positive contribution to our organisation. This in turn helps us to provide better support to our broad client base.
The Role Responsibilities

To bring about a vertical shift in our cloud capabilities, CCIB T&I have prioritized and identified applications to be migrated to cloud platforms. To accelerate our cloud adoption, CCIB T&I has establish CCIB Cloud Enablement Team to defines cloud adoption strategy and addresses the capabilities required to drive the migrations of applications seamlessly while meeting our cyber security, data and regulatory requirements and maintaining our system resiliency.

The Cloud Architect will be responsible for Cloud Assurance, defining Strategies for applications to move to cloud, evaluating Cloud Technology Standards, identifying Cloud Patterns for adoption, running Cloud Architecture Technology Councils, designing & developing cloud-based application for enabling Application Development teams to adopt, this includes Cloud Security Engineering, Orchestrating and automating cloud-based platforms, providing cookie cutter patterns for development
